Receiving chronic medication affect blood pressure control , bradykinin angiotensin system include angiotensinconvertingenzyme inhibitor ( ACEi ) angiotensin receptor blocker ( ARB ) ; 8 . A value outside specify range 90 mm Hg 140 mm Hg systolic blood pressure 50 mm Hg 90 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ( inclusive ) screening ( repeat screen per PI 's discretion ) ; 5 . Serological evidence human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antihepatitis C virus ( AntiHCV ) screening ; 10 . They agree use two reliable method contraception ( e.g. , doublebarrier condom plus diaphragm , condom diaphragm plus stable dose hormonal contraception ) throughout study period 3 month receive study drug .
